headline: Nike Disbands Elite Running Group

summary: A day after an attack on a synagogue left two dead in Halle, eastern Germany, Jews across the country said they felt increasingly under siege from growing anti-Semitism across German society.

headline: Doctors Look to Eye-Tracking to Improve Care
summary: Startups are using technology that follows the movement of the eye to diagnose nearsightedness and help people with disabilities.

headline: Going Apple Picking? Don’t Count on Picking an Apple.
summary: Orchards lure families with petting zoos, zip lines, go-karts and face-painting. ‘We are in the entertainment business now,’ says one farmer.
